short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find the ghost css in your app in a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find the ghost css in your app in a single click.  

When you spend enough time at the front-end development, There will be some irritating moments where you couldn't figure out what is happening with the margins/paddings and scroll issues.

This extension comes in handy finding those ghost elements for you.
